text: LumBug is the best and most cutest thing isn't he!  I am very happy we have him. =)
He does look like a bundle of stick.  But the cutest bundle of sticks!
Lumi is the best fur child that we could ever ask for and we are the luckiest to have him.
Lumi will still go to the dog park but you need to stay home and finish your homework. Then you and Lumi will have a big reunion when we get home.
